forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 20C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 67F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 61F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
